name: CHI NINJA
description:
Welcome to Chi Ninja, the fast-paced game that will test your ninja skills and reflexes like never before!

In a world full of ninjas, our hero must fight his way to freedom using his sharp ninja moves, grappling hook, and ninja stars, as well as his trusty katana. With challenging levels that will put your skills to the test, you’ll have to dodge traps, avoid enemies, and use your ninja abilities to reach the end of each level.

But be warned, the ninja army is not to be underestimated! You’ll face waves of enemies that will test your combat skills, and you’ll need to use all of your ninja abilities to defeat them. You’ll need to be at the top of your game to survive.

But it’s not just about fighting - Chi Ninja also features a range of other challenges that will test your agility and reflexes. You’ll need to use your grappling hook
to reach places , wall jump your way to new heights, and slide under obstacles to make your way through the levels.

With its stylish visuals and fast-paced gameplay, Chi Ninja is the ultimate ninja experience. Do you have what it takes to fight your way to freedom? Play Chi Ninja on Steam today and find out!
